description: The garden is a nice place to relax - people enjoying reading the newspaper or a book while sitting on a bench, looking at and caring for the plants and flowers.The garden has a little casita with a balcony that makes you feel like you are in the country.
name: Brisas Del Caribe
open hours: MTWF 3pm-6pm, S 9am-2pm. Friday and Saturday have flexible hours.
